### 1. AI 기반 환경 적응형 XR 인터페이스 기술 개발 및 실증
*Pages 1-15*

Here’s a 2-3 sentence summary of the section “AI 기반 환경 적응형 XR 인터페이스 기술 개발 및 실증”:

This research focuses on developing AI-powered technology to automatically adapt XR interfaces in real-time based on environmental context. The project will optimize key visual elements like detail level and frame stability, aiming to create intelligent UI/UX systems that seamlessly integrate with diverse environments – exemplified by adapting the Tank Arena game interface. Ultimately, this work addresses the need for dynamic XR experiences by automating adjustments within the user’s surroundings.
